name: Dining Room
description: Curry Senior Center provides seniors with breakfast and lunch 7-days a week. At Curry Senior Center mealtime is not just about eating but also socializing and getting out of their homes. They provide meal delivery for those seniors who are homebound.
fullDescription: Curry Senior Center provides seniors with breakfast and lunch 7-days a week. At Curry Senior Center mealtime is not just about eating but also socializing and getting out of their homes. They provide meal delivery for those seniors who are homebound.

keywords: congregate meals for seniors and people with disabilities
